participant_1.background:
I enjoy watching game shows and designing clothes in my spare time.
i drive a ford mustang.
people say i have a cute laugh.
i am lusting after the neighbour pool boy.
My most valued material possession is my travel journal, filled with memories of my adventures and furry friends.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy sharing the recipes I've collected from my mother and daughters with others.
I'm a pretty short guy, but I make up for it with my big personality.
i am a gentle giant.
I like dressing up for special occasions, but I prefer to wear comfortable clothing on a regular day.
I fear that my family will be judged for the way they are.

content.text: Hey there, I'm a designer in my spare time and I enjoy watching game shows. How are you?
Pretty great! I'm a big fan of game shows too. I'm also a chef and love sharing recipes with others.
Nice! I'd love to try some of your recipes sometime.
Sure! I'm always happy to share. What's your favorite kind of food?
Oh, me too! I have a great recipe for Chicken Enchiladas that you'd probably like.
That sounds delicious! I'd love to try it.
Great! I'll send you the recipe later.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time with my family and friends. I also like to travel.
That sounds great! I love traveling too. I've been to a few different countries.
Me too! I've been to Mexico, Canada, and the United States.
Nice! I've been to all of those places too.
Wow! It's always fun to meet someone who has traveled to the same places as you.
It is! I'm glad we met.
